''[[Portugal]] 1111: A conquista de [[Soure]]'' (Portugal 1111: Soure's Conquest) is a [[Real Time Strategy]] game, developed by [[Ciberbit]], a portuguese multimedia company, in partnership with the [[Soure|Municipality of Soure]] and historians form the [[University of Coimbra]].
+
''[[Portugal]] 1111: A conquista de [[Soure]]'' (Portugal 1111: Soure's Conquest) is a [[Real Time Strategy]] game, developed by [[Ciberbit]], a portuguese multimedia company, in partnership with the [[Soure|Municipality of Soure]] and historians form the [[University of Coimbra]]. <br>
â
It was the first commercial videogame released in Portugal [http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/portugal-1111], making it an important milestone for the Portuguese software and game industry.
+
It was the first commercial videogame completly produced and designed in Portugal [http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/portugal-1111], making it an important milestone for the Portuguese software and game industry.
